extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.
